txt.en:
'Well now, you made your way back here far sooner than I expected! The net is not done yet, but look what I have found! A helper!'

She beams at you pointedly.

'Come now, here is the knot you want to use. With the both of us tying, this will be finished in no time!'
The net is hanging next to Ramsa in Gamwich.\n\nRamsa has asked for your assistance finishing the knots for the net she is making for Adamanda.
Ramsa is in Gamwich.\n\nYou should talk to Ramsa.

'Hello to you, my fine [placeholder]. This is very nice rope and will make an excellent net. Tell Diamond I shall have it for her by mid-day on the morrow.'

You explain that you need it sooner.

'Well that's too bad for you, now isn't it? I have tasks what need doing today and haven't the time for net weaving.

'Although... how comfortable are you with bees? My hives are full of the sweetest honey but not always the sweetest bees. If you take some honey over to Pello at the Brimful Quiver, I could work on the net for Diamond. Mind you don't upset the bees, though. They are quick to anger a' times.'
The net is hanging next to Ramsa in Gamwich.\n\nYou should collect the net and bring it to Adamanda.
DNT - This tree is old and brittle
Adamanda North-took can be found near Nobottle.\n\nYou should bring the net to Adamanda.
DNT - Bring the flax to Anson

'Welcome, friend! What can I get for you today? Ah, you have come for Ramsa's mead is it? I thought you looked sweet!\n\n'Let's have the honey then, and you may collect her bottle from the room behind me.'
DNT - Pick up the rope
You have a feeling this is going to take some time...
Added knots to the net (1/80)
Ramsa Twelling can be found in Gamwich.\n\nAdamanda North-took has asked you to bring the rope to Ramsa Twelling and have her weave it into a net.
DNT - Fallen wood can be found in the forests around Nobottle.\n\nAnson Rope has asked you to collect a fine piece of fallen wood.
Collect the bottle of mead
Two down, 78 to go
Pello can be found in the Brimful Quiver, in Gamwich.\n\nYou should bring the honey to Pello Hartstongue and exchange it for a bottle of mead.
Time seems to fly by as you really get to knotting!
Talk to Ramsa Twelling
Add knots to the net (0/80)
With a fresh bundle of rope in hand, thanks entirely to you having been duped into trading for it, Adamanda is ready for the next stage of her Grand Plan.

'Hello to you, my fine [placeholder]. This is very nice rope and will make an excellent net. Tell Diamond I shall have it for her by mid-day on the morrow.'

You explain that you need it sooner.

'Well that's too bad for you, now isn't it? I have tasks what need doing today and haven't the time for net weaving.

'Although... how comfortable are you with bees? My hives are full of the sweetest honey but not always the sweetest bees. If you take some honey over to Pello at the Brimful Quiver, I could work on the net for Diamond. Mind you don't upset the bees, though. They are quick to anger a' times.'
DNT - The rope is next to Anson in XXX.\n\nYou should pick up the rope.
Add knots to the net (1/80)
Ramsa is in Gamwich.\n\nYou should bring the mead to Ramsa Twelling.
Tying the Knots
DNT - Collected fresh honey ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The net is hanging next to Ramsa in Gamwich.\n\nRamsa has asked for your assistance finishing the knots for the net she is making for Adamanda.

'Oh. You return. You were gone for so long that I forgot you were even doing something for me.'

She glances up at the sky. 

'You are lucky, you know. To be able to travel so far and to see so many things. To make your own future.'

Adamanda is silent a moment and then sighs, and smiles brightly at you.

'Now then! Where is this net that took you so long to procure? We have Grand Plans to enact!'
Talk to Ramsa Twelling
Collected honey
DNT - Collect fresh honey ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The net is hanging next to Ramsa in Gamwich.\n\nRamsa has asked for your assistance finishing the knots for the net she is making for Adamanda.
The net is hanging next to Ramsa in Gamwich.\n\nRamsa has asked for your assistance finishing the knots for the net she is making for Adamanda.
The bottle of mead can be found in the Brimful Quiver, in Gamwich.\n\nPello has given you permission to collect a bottle of mead from the back room.
Bring the honey to Pello
Add knots to the net (2/80)

'Yes, yes, this will do! You did a fine job of harvesting the flax. If you ever give up this adventuring life of yours, you could make a fine farmer!

'Now then, some animal broke into my cabinet on the rope walk and chewed up my top and some other wooden items I use to make rope. The top is a piece of wood with grooves cut into it, you see. It is essential for weaving strands of yarn into rope, and you had best believe it will not produce the same quality with the grooves all chewed up. 

'Go into the forest and find some freshly fallen wood, will you? No need to cut anything down. We had a beast of a storm come through a few nights back. Knocked down all manner of trees that were otherwise healthy. Find a fine piece of wood for me that is not too dried out, rotted, or fragile. Bring me that and I will trade you for the rope.'
Add knots to the net (3/80)
DNT - You found a fine piece of wood

'Well, well! Your first few knots were making me a bit nervous, but you seem to get the hang of it as you went on! Good for you! If you ever want to give up this wandering life of yours, I could see you taking up work as an Apprentice Net Weaver! Go on ahead and take the net to Diamond, and good hunting!'
Talk to Ramsa
DNT - Collect a fine piece of wood
Return to Ramsa
DNT - Fallen wood can be found in the forests around Nobottle.\n\nAnson Rope has asked you to collect a fine piece of fallen wood.
Collect the completed net

Adamanda's laughter fades to a chuckle and she clears her throat, trying to hide her smile.\n\n'Now that we have the rope, we can move on to the next step in my Grand Plan! We need a net! Take the rope to Ramsa Twelling in Gamwich and have her make us a net, will you? I am going to follow these tracks a ways and will meet you further along their trail.'
Fresh honey can be found in hives near Ramsa's dwelling in Gamwich.\n\nRamsa Twelling has asked you to collect honey from her hives.
Bring the net to Adamanda
No honey in this hive
Collect honey
You picked up the bottle
